alert.note: Alert for Jackson (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 23 at 2:19PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Jackson, western Decatur, Miller, southwestern Baker and Seminole Counties through 300 PM EDT/200 PM CDT/... At 219 PM EDT/119 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Colquitt to 7 miles east of Marianna. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Colquitt, Donalsonville, Marianna, Chattahoochee, Sneads, Grand Ridge, Greenwood, Iron City, Brinson, Bascom, Lovedale, Dellwood, Donaldsonville A/P, Buena Vista, Bellview, Hoggard Mill, Eldorendo, Two Egg, Simsville and Cooktown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
